mapper.insert: insert into petdiagnosis values ( diag_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{birth}, EXTRACT(year from sysdate)-EXTRACT(year from #{birth}), #{sex}, #{surgery}, #{weight}, ${breed}, #{condition}, #{file}, sysdate, #{eye1},#{eye2},#{eye3},#{eye4},#{eye5},#{eyecolor},#{skin1},#{skin2},#{skin3},#{skin4},#{skin5})
